title: Bots botting in a bot game
body: I decide to join a bot game to test out my rengar skills and guess what i join a game with 3 bots and one new player who could really get kills. So i try talking to the "players" who would never reply and would do stupid things. One just int the entire game and the other 2 just jungle for a good 90% of the game and they never attack the other bots. Why are people so lazy that they cant even play a bot game. The name of these so called "players" are Victorhugo16, Rhyandus, and Allsquard14. You should take a look at the history and see how the so call "play" the game. We lost the game i wonder why tho.  If anyone riot employers see this please ban these accounts. Thank you for your time{{champion:32}}

My first game of league, my friend let me try a bot game on his account so I could see if I liked it before downloading the game (this is like 5-6 years ago, nobody knew wtf league was). Neither of us knew how to unlock the camera and I kid you not I was lost in the jungle for 15 minutes before wandering into a tower and dying. We lost 5 minutes later.

Not that that's really relevant overall, I just think it's a funny story that fit what y'all were talking about.

Yeah, actually I think I've met these bots too, cuz as you said they do literally nothing but farming.  I might think it is new players or "trolling" players for the first time, but meeting such "players" every 2nd game and seeing almost the same behaviour pattern, just can't mean anything else but bots in place.
